languages.text: "Я не желала ранить тебя словами, элантах. Ты видел{mf||а}, сколько тяжести скопилось в твоем сердце. Постарайся беречь его".
"I did not mean to hurt you with my words, elantach. You saw how much heaviness had amassed in your heart. Try to take care of it."
languages.original_text: "Я не желала ранить тебя словами, элантах. Ты видел{mf||а}, сколько тяжести скопилось в твоем сердце. Постарайся беречь его".

traits.locale_text: "I didn't want to hurt you with my words, elantach. You've seen how much weight had your heart accumulated. Try to take care of it."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I didn't want to hurt you with my words, elantach. You've seen how much weight had your heart accumulated. Try to take care of it."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I did not mean to hurt you with my words, elantach. You saw how much heaviness had amassed in your heart. Try to take care of it."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I did not mean to hurt you with my words, elantach. You saw how much heaviness had amassed in your heart. Try to take care of it."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I did not mean to hurt you with my words, elantach. You saw how much heaviness had amassed in your heart. Try to take care of it."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “我无意刺痛你的心，外界人。你已经亲眼看到了你的内心是多么沉重，请照顾好自己的心灵吧。”
languages.original_text: "I did not mean to hurt you with my words, elantach. You saw how much heaviness had amassed in your heart. Try to take care of it."

traits.locale_text: “我无意刺痛你的心，外界人。你已经亲眼看到了你的内心是多么沉重，请照顾好自己的心灵吧。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «No era mi intención hacerte daño con mis palabras, elantach. Ya has visto cuánta carga se ha acumulado en tu corazón. Procura deshacerte de ella».
languages.original_text: "I did not mean to hurt you with my words, elantach. You saw how much heaviness had amassed in your heart. Try to take care of it."

traits.locale_text: «No era mi intención hacerte daño con mis palabras, elantach. Ya has visto cuánta carga se ha acumulado en tu corazón. Procura deshacerte de ella».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Je ne voulais pas vous blesser, elantach, mais vous avez bien vu le fardeau qui s'était accumulé dans votre cœur. Il faut veiller à l'alléger. »
languages.original_text: "I did not mean to hurt you with my words, elantach. You saw how much heaviness had amassed in your heart. Try to take care of it."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne voulais pas vous blesser, elantach, mais vous avez bien vu le fardeau qui s'était accumulé dans votre cœur. Il faut veiller à l'alléger. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ich wollte Euch mit meinen Worten nicht verletzen, Elantach. Ihr habt gesehen, wie viel Schwere sich in Eurem Herzen angesammelt hatte. Versucht, Euch darum zu kümmern."
languages.original_text: "I did not mean to hurt you with my words, elantach. You saw how much heaviness had amassed in your heart. Try to take care of it."

traits.locale_text: "Ich wollte Euch mit meinen Worten nicht verletzen, Elantach. Ihr habt gesehen, wie viel Schwere sich in Eurem Herzen angesammelt hatte. Versucht, Euch darum zu kümmern."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「我の言葉で傷つけるつもりはなかった、エランタ。お前は自身の心にどれほどの重圧が溜まっているかを見ただろう。それを整理するように努めるのだ」
languages.original_text: "I did not mean to hurt you with my words, elantach. You saw how much heaviness had amassed in your heart. Try to take care of it."

traits.locale_text: 「我の言葉で傷つけるつもりはなかった、エランタ。お前は自身の心にどれほどの重圧が溜まっているかを見ただろう。それを整理するように努めるのだ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Sözlerimle seni incitmek istemedim elantach. Yüreğinde biriken ağırlığı sen de gördün. Kendine iyi bakmalısın."
languages.original_text: "I did not mean to hurt you with my words, elantach. You saw how much heaviness had amassed in your heart. Try to take care of it."

traits.locale_text: "Sözlerimle seni incitmek istemedim elantach. Yüreğinde biriken ağırlığı sen de gördün Kendine iyi bakmalısın."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
